text: What is the first thing you notice when you arrive here?
How long have you been working your role today?
What kind of outfit would you expect to wear right now?
If you had a break, where would you go?
What is the biggest challenge you have to handle here?
What sounds are you hearing around you right now?
Do you interact with visitors or mainly coworkers?
What time of day is busiest for you?
What special equipment do you rely on?
Are you indoors, outdoors, or somewhere in between?
How would you describe the lighting where you are?
Who is responsible for keeping things safe here?
Is food a big part of your day here?
What do you do when something unexpected happens?
How long does it take to get here from home?
Do you ever need to travel as part of this role?
What kind of people do you usually meet here?
Is there a uniform or dress code involved?
What do you look forward to most during your time here?
What kind of weather would make this place difficult?
